description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. A game of classic pool for the XBox 360 with 3D visuals and realistic ball dynamics.  Play a 1 player match against the XBox or a 2 player match against a friend, or play an exciting game against the clock.
description.short: A game of classic pool for the XBox 360 with 3D visuals and realistic ball dynamics.  Play a 1 player match against the XBox or a 2 player match against a friend, or play an exciting game against the clock.
